Product Id: This table replaces tables 18-10-0049-01 and 18-10-0050-01 which were archived with the release of first quarter 2018 data. Data for the new index series are available starting in 2017Q1. Data for periods prior to the first quarter of 2017 were obtained by linking the new building construction price indexes with comparable index series published in tables 18-10-0049-01 and 18-10-0050-01.
All geographic regions are based on the 2016 Census boundaries.
